content.text:
Let me help you solve this block construction task by analyzing the images systematically:

Main Target Image Analysis:
- Total Blocks: 7 blocks
- Colors: Yellow (top/bottom base blocks), Green (middle vertical blocks), Blue, Red
- Structure: Two-layered construction with yellow base blocks at bottom and top
- Two slightly different structures side by side

Block Dictionary Analysis:
I have identified the blocks needed from the dictionary with their corresponding indices:

For Left Structure:
- Yellow base blocks (bottom/top): Indices 11 and 12
- Green vertical blocks: Indices 7 and 8

For Right Structure:
- Yellow base blocks (bottom/top): Indices 11 and 12
- Green vertical middle block: Index 7
- Blue block: Index 1
- Red block: Index 4

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 11 (yellow bottom base)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (green vertical)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (blue)
    Step4: Move block with index 4 (red)
    Step5: Move block with index 7 (green vertical)
    Step6: Move block with index 11 (yellow top base)
}
